task_name: Check the status of your iPhone repair on apple.

description.thought: To check the status of an iPhone repair on Apple's website, I first need to navigate to the Apple support page.  Since there's no accessibility tree or previous trace, I'll use the `goto` action.
description.action: Navigating to Apple's support website to initiate the repair status check.
